column4: is there a way to make aptitude install from downloaded packages? i'm stuck without a gui after attempting to switch to xubuntu from ubuntu. and i want to follow this: http://askubuntu.com/questions/18920/any-way-to-get-a-fresh-ubuntu-desktop-without-re-installing/18993#18993
i accidentally cleaned the cache a while ago. but i'm working on downing the appropriate packages.

dont worry, you can install any package from any location on your system with: dpkg, try to use comodin (*) to force the "Deb Package" install the deps (this dont work in all cases, but you can try it)
